serviceList.title: Creative services
serviceList.desc: Creative services are a sub sector of the creative industries, a part of the economy that creates wealth by offering creativity for hire to other businesses. Creative Services also means a department within a company that does creative work such as writing, designing, and production. It is often a sub-department of the marketing organization.
